JS Dependency Plugin
Last Published: 2011-11-07  | Version: 1.5
JS Dependency Plugin
Parent Project
  • JavaScript Framework
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

jsdependency:js-dependency

Full name:

com.github.jlgrock.javascript-framework:jsdependency-maven-plugin:1.5:js-dependency

Description:

Get files.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven 2.0 project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: compile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
closureExtractLibDirectory File - The default directory to extract dependency files marked with classifier of "external". This likely shouldn't be changed unless there is a conflict with another plugin.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework.
frameworkTargetDirectory File - The default directory to extract dependency files to. This will do anything with a classifier that is unspecified or "internal".
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework.

Parameter Details

closureExtractLibDirectory:

The default directory to extract dependency files marked with classifier of "external". This likely shouldn't be changed unless there is a conflict with another plugin.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework

frameworkTargetDirectory:

The default directory to extract dependency files to. This will do anything with a classifier that is unspecified or "internal".
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}${file.separator}javascriptFramework
